spatial_accuracy.notes: The evaluation engine failed to identify a 3D isometric render. The second image provided is a digital copy/slight variation of the 2D plan, not a 3D extrusion. All points for 3D spatial scaling and wall visibility are forfeited.

structural_fidelity.notes: Failure to generate a 3D floating model. The image retains 2D top-down perspective, text labels, measurement lines, and a 2D compass, which are all strictly prohibited.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture remains 2D illustrations from the original plan rather than converted block-style 3D assets.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Incorrect camera/perspective (Top-down instead of Isometric Orthographic). Textures are present (wood grain, marble), and lighting is baked-in 2D gradients rather than 3D flat shading.

detected_errors.description: Model is not 3D isometric; it is a 2D top-down floor plan.
Image contains text labels and measurement lines (e.g., 'BED-1', '12 X 18'9') which are strictly forbidden.
Render contains detailed textures and is not low-poly geometry.
